entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MethodInfo.Invoke AVs when invoking a method with an 'out void*' parameter #59068
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59061
  • Console.ReadKey throws in unexpected circumstances #59059
  • [BUG] TimeBeginPeriod / TimeEndPeriod strange behavior while loading dynamically from an assembly #59058
  • On Linux GetSocketOption will close socket on Don'tLinger request #59055
  • [Mono]: Random crash in interpreter when doing stackwalks as part of STW. #59054
  • Proposal: Use `FieldInfo.GetRawConstantValue` to get the `.data` of fields with `HasFieldRVA`. #59052
  • Code optimization of Debugger.cs (CoreCLR) #59048
    7.0.0
  • Order of serialized properties determined by dictionary enumeration on fast-path source generators #59043
    7.0.0
  • Source generator should share property-level custom converters #59041
    7.0.0
  • Crossgen2 error on arm64 for GitHub_17777 #59040
  • Custom equality operator in generic expressions provoke BadImageFormatExceptions #59035
  • System.Drawing.Common is no longer usable from < netcoreapp3.1 projects #59032
  • Jit should inline CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_REF (at least for hot paths) #59031
    Future
  • ZipArchive.Open will read non seakable stream to memory & fail with bad error on large streams #59027
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Hard-coded path to Xcode #59022
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions: Missing net standard 2.1 type forwarders in Nuget Package #59021
  • Marshal.GetHINSTANCE(module) works on Windows but not on Linux/OSX #59020
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel.ForAsync #59019
  • Backport `UseConsoleLifetime()` fix from net6 to net5. #59014
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/interlocked/exchange/exchangefloat/exchangefloat.sh #59009
    7.0.0
  • Test Failure SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd #59008
    Future

Closed

  • Remove platform restriction from Hosting.WindowsServices #59037
    6.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Versioning - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58664
    6.0.0
  • Run "dotnet --info" on Win11,the RID shown "win10-x64" #58125
  • Microsoft.Win32.Handles - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54871
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Arm64 to ProcessorArchitecture and ImageFileMachine enums #58970
  • System.Net - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54857
    6.0.0
  • System.Security - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54868
    6.0.0
  • `*Operators` interfaces naming #59030
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeIntermediateWithInvalidRevocationSignature(pkiOptions: IssuerRevocationViaOcsp | AllEndEntityRevocation | IssuerAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #59010
  • System.Linq - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58662
    6.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!replacedInLowering' #58972
    6.0.0
  • General protection fault on Linux #10631
    Future
  • Test failed: baseservices/threading/threadpool/unregister/regression_749068/regression_749068.sh #13453
    7.0.0
  • Resident Set Size on Linux remains much higher than managed memory usage in .NET 5.0 #52592
    6.0.0
  • Missing prerequisite for dotnet on Alpine #56422
    Future
  • [tvOS] Environment.GetSpecialFolder is too eager in creating the special directories #58787
    6.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\methodoverriding\\regressions\\549411\\exploit\\exploit.cmd #57794
  • MemoryCache stopped working in 5.0.0 #59025
  • System.Text.Json source gen containing non-localized error messages #58292
    6.0.0
  • HashSet<T> take out extra element during 'foreach' #59026
  • [Long Running Test] pauseonstart.sh #58893
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/reverse/reverse/reverse.sh #58599
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/pauseonstart/pauseonstart/pauseonstart.sh #58781
  • .NET 6.0 Model Validation #58886
  • Crossgen2 fails with null reference exception. #58181
    7.0.0
  • [Proposal] Create benchmarks for performance quality assurance #58995

PullRequests

Created

  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59070
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Update attribute name used for controlling frame pointer elimination #59069
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • UpdateJson and CompilerServices.Unsafe versions #59067
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove SupportedOSPlatforms windows on Hosting WindowsServices #59064
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change branch name for perf repo clone #59063
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Runtime changes for DetectPreviewFeaturesAnalyzer #59062
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59060
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Eliminate PROJECTK_BUILD from RF #59057
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix EventPipe sample profiler resolution on Windows. #59056
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Add missing docs to System.Text.Json #59053
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: simple VN budget stress mode #59051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonExtensionData in STJ source-gen #59047
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Change macOS activatin injection failure handling #59045
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove benign assert #59044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Add missing System.Linq API docs #59038
    documentation, area-System.Linq
  • Use getpwuid(3) in corehost for the $HOME-less user #59036
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59033
    area-Single-File
  • [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59029
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [tvOS] Be less eager in creating the non-existent special folders #59024
    area-System.Runtime, os-ios
  • Share init-compiler with arcade #59018
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Fix variables names in perf automation #59046
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58412
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.11
  • Remove SupportedOSPlatforms windows on Hosting WindowsServices #59039
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] browser-bench improvements #59028
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Replace constant strings with SyntaxKind #57898
    area-Extensions-Logging, 7.0.0
  • Fix EventPipe sample profiler resolution on Windows. #58997
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs (#58592) #58926
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58910
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Throw on unsupported types in src gen #58983
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [tvOS] Be less eager in creating the non-existent special folders #58788
    area-System.Runtime, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • Remove benign assert #58980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fix ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57562
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, 5.0.x
  • Add JitStress=1/2 runs to jitstress-isas-x86 pipeline #58822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [Mono]: Potential deadlock during EventPipe rundown using interpreter. #59023
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Use alloca for runtime_invoke retval buffer #59006
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [tasks] [net472] Add ProjectReferences to JsonToItemsTaskFactory #58917
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • Remove too-short a timeout for a GCStress test #57245
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst and test fixes for Android #58841
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Add `JitEnregStats` complus. #58776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve error messages expanding single-file #58557
    area-Single-File, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix SIMD temp register interference #58990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Turn on the mobile device telemetry (XHarness workloads) #58864
  • Remove `GTF_NO_CSE` on the first `FIELD_LIST` arg (x86 specific) #57411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Emit diagnostics & exceptions for sourcegen handling init-only properties & JsonInclude attributes #58993
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [Mono]: Potential deadlock during EventPipe rundown using interpreter. #58996
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono] Avoid some null checks in the sgen alloc wrappers. #58968
    area-GC-mono
  • Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #58965
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • fix SendAsync from inpersonificated context with default credentials #58922
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59007
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] [HTTP/3] Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measurement pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58895
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/5.0] Add Fedora 36 RID #57703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Initialize compCurBB during fgInsertGCPoll #57334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use unsigned casts for array/Span indexers #57970
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
  • Experiment with compressing individual method contexts #59000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable outerloop helix legs on the "runtime-coreclr outerloop" pipeline. #57068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #58967
    area-System.Console
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve morphing of comparisons #54204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add dependency graph viewer tool #55304
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Swap using the provided indexes #55331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58919
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Clear() to MemoryCache #57631
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 7.0.0
  • Extend MemoryCacheOptions with TrackLinkedCacheEntries #57648
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • EnvironmentVariables config add missing prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ #57546
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Unify BuildWasmRuntimes target and use cmake #58878
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Remove duplicates from the AOT data blob. #58982
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Follow up on Scatter/Gather API changes #58447
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Delete dead code #56865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove a volatile access from TaskScheduler.Id #58991
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    area-System.IO
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize thread state transition #58992
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Use less calls for MoveDirectory #58869
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix building GC on Android #58703
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WASM] Adding a new switch to run wasm on NodeJS #54640
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Crash after publishing .net5 console app having C++/CLI dependency #20231
  • Additional C# global imports #18825
    Backlog
  • Blazor-wasm/Linux: getting two publish directories named `Publish`, and `publish` #20923
  • Garbage collection output does not list the pack IDs #20350
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet workload update command fails with ArgumentNullException #20914
  • dotnet restore: Slow restore performance #18467

Updated

  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web global using statements break Serilog/NLog/log4net consumers on upgrade #20747
  • ApplicationIcon does not work when cross building win-x64 from Linux #3943
  • Multilayer Directory.Build.props results in CS0105 #20854
  • [Loc]Strings are over translated on .net5 SDK installation completion dialog for DE/SC/TK. #12394
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Only throw missing reference path error when running with references #20972
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.source-build reference #20971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Allow duplicates in resolved files to publish #20961
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #20959
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/3.1.1xx] Remove blob feeds #20553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix the casing for the default PublishUrl property #20965
    Area-WebSDK
  • Change Compatibility projects' TargetFrameworks #20964
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix workload pack records serialization #20876
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Support multi-targeting for Roslyn components #20793
    Area-NetSDK
  • Fix nuget config not being honored #20930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix EnableTrimAnalyzer for TFMs < 6.0 #20937
    Area-ILLink
  • Add a test for SuppressRazorSourceGenerator incrementalism #20929
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Event hookup in object initializer #5176

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stack Overflow in src\Workspaces\Core\Portable\Workspace\Solution\SolutionState.CompilationTracker.cs #56356
  • Roslyn fails to correctly infer nullability of foreach variables' types if deconstruction is used #56352
    Compiler.Next

Closed

  • Changing project context in shared project causes non-fatal error #52723
    17.0
  • I can't use source generator with package reference #56024
    17.0
  • How to get Metadata for SourceGenerator - Documenation #50880
    17.0
  • Constant, frequent crash VS 16.11 with Source Generator use #55658
    17.0
  • Reduce Roslyn.RazorCSharp file size in AppData\Local\Temp\VSLogs #52048
    17.0
  • Find all references for a "global" using alias finds alias references only in the file that defines it #55894
    17.1
  • Sporadic failures in AbstractPersistentStorageTests #53362
    17.0
  • [Responsiveness] Roslyn should disable MEF v2 path inside Visual Studio #53788
    17.0
  • Feature 'Navigate to' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #54464
    17.0
  • The error: CS0236 is reported incorrectly on a nullable enum property with same name as enum type. #56348
  • Generating Instance Registrations For Classes Holding Async Methods #55500
    17.0
  • Incorrect 'is not null there' hint #56259
  • Adding doc xml comment breaks indentation of the next line #55492
    17.0
  • Can the Formatter annotate nodes that it doesn't touch #56014
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce Parameter Priority #56359
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #56357
    Area-Analyzers
  • Delete remaining bits of IWaitIndicator #56355
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Diagnostics TaggerDelay #56354
    Area-IDE
  • Follow syntaxfacts pattern #56351
    Area-IDE
  • Remove ErrorTypeException from native int decoder #56350
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56358
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update generate-compiler-code.ps1 #56353
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56311
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support find refs on global aliases. #56326
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add vscode workspace settings to the gitignore #56143
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56364
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56363
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56362
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56361
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Control exposure of tuple fields #56293
    Area-Compilers
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Hold onto the TextBufferContainer for a ITextBuffer weakly #53245
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline diagnostics and intellicode cohesion #55095
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Errors
  • Support implicit conversions of lambda expressions to LambdaExpression #56200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Infer delegate type from lambda expression with explicit return statements without expressions #56236
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Factor process telemetry service out of RemoteHostService #56329
    Area-IDE
  • Read StorageOptions from solution snapshot. #56307
    Area-IDE
  • Fix equals operator with split state on right #56321
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Don't specifically dismiss the sig help session on down key press #51241
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Avoid duplicates in automatically generated endpoint names #36487
  • HTTP/3: Enable in Kestrel by default in .NET 7 #36486
  • [Blazor] Add AoT pipeline on the SDK repo to validate AoT scenarios with automation #36481
  • Validate state of Blazor with RC2 bits #36471
    6.0-rc2
  • [Question/Bug] EmptyBodyBehavior.Allow behavior #36466
  • Unexpected Inequality of FieldIdentifiers #36465
    Discussions
  • Blazor appsettings.Development.json is wrong #36457
    6.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Error while copying content to a stream. .Net 5 #36455
  • Publish Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements #36454
    6.0.0
  • Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: }. #36453
    6.0-rc2
  • 🐞 The `WebApplicationBuilder.Configuration` add custom configuration provider was called more than once. #36452
    6.0-rc2
  • HTTP/3: Improve the preview features warning message. #36450
    6.0-rc2

Closed

  • HTTP/3: Get QUIC tests running on CI #34741
    6.0-rc2
  • Settings_MaxConcurrentStreamsPost_Server test failure #27370
    Next sprint planning
  • Big-endian platforms not supported #35709
    6.0-rc2
  • WSS Closure Immediately after KeepAlive #36308
  • SecurityStampValidator reissues the session cookie and extends its expiry #36373
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WASM : cannot convert from 'System.TimeSpan' to 'System.DateTime' #36427
  • Fix `Caching_SendFileWithFullContentLength_Cached()` #32853
    Next sprint planning
  • New analyzer rule: Don't write to your own parameters #36429
  • Bug in preview 2022 - Rolling back from .net6 to .net5 in Blazor #36443
  • Injecting in to class inheriting from RevalidatingServerAuthenticationStateProvider #36456
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Tests.HostingApplicationTests.IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated fails #36472
  • DotNetSteamReference does not exist #36461
  • Add docs for using HTTP/3 with HTTP.sys #35204
    6.0-rc2
  • Minimal API endpoints do not appear in OpenAPI if WithGroupName() is used #36414
  • Get HttpContextAccessor in .Net 6 #36440
  • Kestrel doesn't allow to use self-signed certificates. #36204
  • Passing null to NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter requires a cast #36411
  • Is it considerable to align the naming(version) of .NET stacks with .NET 7? #36447
  • Perf improvement: mvc #36444

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Check for duplicate endpoint names on startup #36488
    area-runtime
  • Don't ignore XML doc warnings for Polly #36485
    area-runtime
  • [release/5.0] Test in manual internal builds #36484
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Test in manual internal builds #36483
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `796e436` to `a64c11d` #36482
    area-infrastructure
  • Try to fix razor content #36479
    area-identity
  • Update build.gradle #36478
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Update build.gradle #36477
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Stop using unencrypted git protocol in build.gradle #36476
    area-signalr
  • Quarantine failing test #36473
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #36470
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] Fix https://github.com/aspnet/AspNetCore-ManualTests/issues/828 #36467

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How can the raw assets be accessed programmatically in MAUI? #2472
  • [Bug] Blazor integration issue for iOS and MacOS StaticWebAssets.build.json does not exist #2468
  • [Bug] Polygon doesn't redraw when given new points programmatically. #2467
  • [Bug] [Android] Null Reference Exception when creating Path with no Data set. #2466
  • [Bug] Line X and Y values don't redraw when set programmaticly. #2465
  • [Bug] Polyline doesn't redraw when given new points programmatically. #2464

Closed

  • [Bug] VisualDiagnostics SourceInfo URIs are absolute instead of relative. #2418
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • Accessing the NativeView of a Maui.View #2470
  • [Question] Platform specific code and packages #2257
  • [Bug] Package not found #2260

PullRequests

Created

  • Make factory fall back to CreateNativeView #2471
  • Minimal changes required to support RemoteWebView #2469

Merged

  • use relativepath for XamlFilePath #2448
  • Add option to specify static factory method for creating native views #2457

Updated

  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Border control #2445
  • Add extension method for modifying an existing mapping. #2458
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • [Android] Clean up a little bit WebView #2431
  • Make VC Public on PageHandler so it's replaceable #2460

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RevEng: allow to reverse-engineer indexes on period columns #26008
  • RevEng: add a way to handle shadow properties when generating a entity code file #26007
  • SQL Server: cannot add value-converted timestamp column #25997
  • Improve provider scaffolding by providing a specification base class #25996
  • Scaffolding command amends PK column name (intcol to intcol1) #25995
  • Scaffolding naming problem in .Net 5 #25988
  • Connection Resilience with Cross Context Transaction while using same sql connection. #25987

Closed

  • EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.9 Extension Method with eager loading Include does not work without Load(); #26006
  • Query: InMemoryExpressionTranslatingEV needs to override MemberInit #19214
  • [dotnet counters] Query Cache Hit Rate (%) is NaN #25142
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Incorrect insert SQL when composite key contains identity and default value properties #23941
    6.0.0
  • Nullable references not supported by GetColumnType/GetDefaultValueSql #25991
  • Allow defining column order via [ColumnAttribute.Order] when creating tables #10059
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Query/InMemory: NRE when doing cast followed by Include + ThenInclude #22692
    6.0.0
  • InMemory: Function argument becoming nullable due to optional navigation #17540
    6.0.0
  • Query/InMemory: compilation error for complex query with correlated collection and distinct #24291
    6.0.0
  • InMemory database provider with Boolean discriminator TPH fails #24657
    6.0.0
  • Simple uses of MathF fail on SQL Server #25421
    6.0.0
  • Query/InMemory: projecting (int?)(myBaseEntity as MyDerivedEntity).IntOnDerived defaults to 0 rather than null #25735
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Extract join predicate from Having for group by aggregate queries #26011
  • Query: Translate object.Equals correctly when object argument passed … #26010
  • Query: Add regression test for #21665 #26009
  • Bundles: Copy NuGet.Config and global.json files #26005
  • Query: Avoid incorrect cast when simplifying null check #26004
  • Query: Add regression test for #19726 #26002
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.20.1 to 3.21.0 #26001
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 7.5.8 to 8.0.2 #26000
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25999
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix adding value-converted rowversion column #25998
  • Don't hard-code value generation to Never for FKs #25992
  • Throw better exception for many-to-many with same navigation on both ends #25990

Merged

  • Add a way for providers to filter out non-identity conditions. #25973
  • Migrations: Honor [Column(Order)] in CreateTable operation #25942
    auto-merge
  • Query: Re-enable few tests #25976
  • Query: Enable test for #24291 #25974
  • Query: Add regression test for #24657 #25972
  • Query: Convert result of Round appropriately for MathF functions #25970
  • InMemory: Read nullable value for derived properties #25968

Updated

  • Clear all connection pools before attempting to delete SQLite file #25985
  • Finish linking to conceptual docs #25983
  • Better exception message when switching from owned to non-owned configuration #25984
  • Allow UseTransaction to replace existing transaction #25979

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The .NET 6 x64 installer should not permit 10.13 #11976

Closed

  • .NET Coding Pack fails to install the .NET extension pack in VS Code #11977

PullRequests

Created

  • Add FreeBSD RIDs to known targets #11972

Merged

  • Exclude externals project in vstest when building from source #11980
  • [ArPow] Exclude test projects from roslyn-analyzers in source-build #11978
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Tweaks for RTM stable building and servicing #11938
  • [ArPow] Update prebuilts and pipeline build agents (#11779) #11974

Updated

  • [ArPow] Update previous source-built #11705
  • [main] Tweaks for RTM stable building and servicing #11936
  • [ArPow] Add text-only packages to tarball #11967
  • [ArPow] Run smoke tests for tarball CI #11023
